name: FATE SAGA
description:
"When peace has come to an end, evil is preparing for the resurrection, only a hero can stop it

FATE SAGA is a Turn Based RPG, carrying simple gameplay, FATE comes with classic JRPG feel.

The goddess of light has chosen heroes, the hero must do what is commanded to save the world and also to restore his erased memory.
